content.p: If you have health and safety issues that needs resolving, first report it to your line manager followed by your Business Unit health and safety coordinator or other safety critical role. The latter can then refer to the University Health and Safety Department if required. Listed below are the names and contact details for members of staff in the central Health and Safety Department: Pharmacy Building (Building 63) University Park University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2RD Telephone: Telephone: +44 (0)115 9513401 Email: h&s@nottingham.ac.uk
